title: Aqua Mail Pro
descriptionHTML:
Aqua Mail Pro is an unlocker key for Aqua Mail, which turns the FREE version of the app into Pro.

The advantages of using Aqua Mail Pro include:

‚óè Push mail for Exchange (corporate email) in the Pro version
‚óè Add multiple accounts
‚óè Supports per-account identities (aliases)
‚óè Removes the promo signature linking to this site to all outgoing messages
‚óè Ad-free

For successful activation, please install the base application first. Upgrading preserves all accounts, folders, messages and settings.

Aqua Mail is an email app for personal and corporate email. This is the perfect replacement for your current email app as it provides the flexibility of working the way you are used to.

Aqua Mail has plenty of options for customizing the app as well as convenient features which improve your efficiency of managing e-mails. Modify how it looks and works to become more productive.

Aqua Mail supports automatic setup for the more popular email providers, works fluently with others, or lets you enter mail server settings yourself.

KEY FEATURES:
‚óè Multiple email providers: Gmail, Yahoo, Hotmail, FastMail, Apple, GMX, AOL and more;
‚óè Mail accounts hosted at: Google Apps, Yahoo BizMail, Office 365, Exchange Online and others;
‚óè Support for standard Internet email protocols: IMAP, POP3, SMTP; Exchange: EWS;
‚óè Improved security: OAUTH2 authentication for Gmail, Hotmail and Yahoo;
‚óè Instant incoming email delivery (push mail): servers supporting the IMAP IDLE extension (most Internet mail services except Yahoo; self-hosted IMAP servers);
‚óè Integration with: Light Flow, Enhanced SMS & Caller ID, Cloud Print, Apex Launcher Pro, Nova Launcher / Tesla Unread, Executive Assistant, DashClock Widget;
‚óè Integration with Tasker: change settings, trigger mail checks, trigger events based on incoming messages

ADVANCED FEATURES:
‚óè Stay up to date with home screen widgets: message counts and message lists;
‚óè Access existing folder structure: synchronize Drafts, Sent, and Deleted Messages of web mail and desktop mail apps;
‚óè Access server Contacts: autocomplete from your personal address book and corporate directory (for Exchange and Office 365) when composing messages;
‚óè Sync Calendar: allows two-way synchronization of Calendar events (for Exchange and Office 365);
‚óè Format your messages and signatures: insert images and links, add colors and styling to text;
‚óè Save attachments as files;
‚óè Browse messages grouped into conversations (can be turned off);
‚óè Reply via voice input: Android Wear notifications with message previews and actions;
‚óè Undo message operations: ‚ÄúDelete‚Äù, ‚ÄúMove to folder‚Äù, and other actions can be reversed;
‚óè Backup and restore your accounts and settings: via popular cloud services (Dropbox, OneDrive, Box and Google Drive) or a file;
‚óè Optimize for your internet connection: separate settings for WiFi and mobile data.

OS REQUIREMENTS:
The unlocker is compatible down to Android 2.1. The current version of Aqua Mail requires 4.0.3 or higher.

CONTACT US:
If you have any questions, feedback or suggestions please contact us directly at support@aqua-mail.com.
summary: Email for Gmail, Yahoo, Outlook, Hotmail and more - IMAP, POP3 and Exchange

title: ActiveDir Manager
description:
ActiveDir Manager is a network admin tool for windows active directory user and computer management.
Similar to Active Directory Users and Computers (ADUC).

Admin windows network user accounts and computers from any android phone or tablet  (wifi, vpn or other network connection).   

Main Features:
-Set user Passwords
-Undo Password Lockouts
-Enable or Disable users
-Edit User attributes (address, phone #, misc contact attribs)
-Adjust Group Membership (members and memberOf)
-Use computer objects to remote control domain computers (RDP/VNC apps supported; see additional info)
-Directory Search for User/Group/Computer
-Explorer "Tree Style" view
-Move, Delete and Undelete Objects (tombstone objects) 
-Simple find only Locked users
-Supports TLS, SSL, or non-encrypted sessions
-Supports all current AD versions and functional modes
-Save connection settings for multiple directories.
-Unlimited directory size (result size adjustable)
-No server software required; utilizes Native Active Directory LDAP provider.
-Standard Wifi or VPN network access, no abnormal firewall configurations.

*If you experience problems, please email me using the contact form http://www.activedir.mobi/?page_id=15

This is a Windows Admin tool, intended for use by network administrators and various IT professionals.  Valid credentials are required to connect to a windows domain.

ActiveDir connects to any Windows Server Active Directory via an LDAP connection.  No additional software is required; however Active Directory Services does require a basic certificate configuration to enable encryption (req'd to set passwords).  This is typical started by adding the AD Certificate or Certificate Services role.

*RDP and VNC functions are provided by Yongtao Wang's remote tools.  All 5 rdp/vnc tools are supported and auto-detected when present, selecting pro over lite/ad supported.  Passing the current credentials (effectively SSO) only functions on Pro and Enterprise versions. http://www.remotespark.com/android_solution.html (also available on Android Market)

*TLS Unavailable Error most likely indicates the domain controller isn't capable of LDAP encryption.  A connection can usually be made by disabling TLS and SSL in the connection profile.  This will allow a non-encrypted connection with the drawback that AD LDAP will not perform password updates without encryption.

To enable LDAP Encrpytion (TLS and SSL):
*Active Directory Certificate Services should be added to one  domain controller to provide SSL/TLS security, which is needed to set passwords.  In many environments this requirement may already be in place, if not adding a private Enterprise-CA for your organization is a fairly simple process.  More information is availiable in our FAQ here:   http://www.activedir.mobi/?page_id=12

*ActiveDir is bound by the Active Directory Security policies that regulate directory security, authentication and object visibility.  Valid credentials must be used to gain required access to the AD system, standard (non-admin) user accounts can be used, under normal security permissions standard accounts cannot alter data without being granted Administrator or Special access.

(*)Active Directory and Windows Server are a trademark of Microsoft Corp.

comments: Work fine, user interface can be improved
Love this app.  Does what I need!

This is a useful app for when I am on the road to be able to perform simple AD Tasks. But the one feature which is mosy noticible by its absence, is the New User.  Whilst on client sites I often need to create a new user account to give them access to our help desk, as it stands, I must use my laptop to perform this task, life wold be so much better if I could do this with my Android.  I noticed it is on your RoadMap, I was just wondering when it might be implemented?

Paired with a VPN client this app allows basic view & edit capabilities in active directory.  I wouldn't want to try much more than account unlocks and password resets, but it handles those actions well and has a handy feature to let you get straight to locked accounts.  A few pounds to avoid having to find a computer to do a password reset seems fair to me.

The user search function just doesn't work. I like this app cause I can browse AD through the tree just fine. I can remote to computers with the junction-ed RDP app. I can unlock and lock loaned laptops. I can go to an office and reset a users password for them, BUT only if I can find them. If they are a new hire, there is no guarantee that they were placed in the correct AD container. So I have to go back to my desk and find them. This isn't too much of a hassle for new employees. But, when I'm helping a classroom of 100 new students, most of whom can't log in because they didn't read their email, it becomes a problem.

comments: I love the simplicity of this program. It's so much smoother and quicker than using Word and Excel. I took off one star since I couldn't move the cursor with the Samsung Keyboard, but that's probably Samsung's fault.
Premium key gets disabled for no reason. I paid for this to remove the ads so its extremely upsetting to see ads everytime I use it.

I've always used this app since my first smartphone. Easy to use, does what I want, except for Tables in Excel, but like one of the other reviews noted, it hasn't been update for awhile and I really wish they would. You can print from almost any app except this one. If I want to print I'd have to send the document to another app or email to my computer than print it.  Please update it so I can print from it or else I'm going to have to use another app, which I really don't want to.
This program has major problems with locking out premium purchase customers. It is asking to purchase the item (again)

missing one of the most rudimentary options. a search function and that is the sole reason I rated it one star. really ? It's not that difficult. I have a hard time wrapping my head around as to why it does not This app has bean out for a long time and they have not managed to incorporate that. with that being said all other function are easy an simple. once I find an app as easy and simple to use with a search function ? goodbye. I just have not taken the time to look so I am sure there is one.

title: Superpowers by SYPartners
description:
Unlock your superpower. Everyone has one‚Äîa unique capability that you bring to a team. Something you do better than anyone else. What‚Äôs yours?
Superpowers is a fun and simple tool to help you and your team learn about your individual superpowers, and how to use them to be at your best. Next time you have a team kick-off or are preparing for an interview, use Superpowers to set yourself up for success. It‚Äôs also a great gift for friends and colleagues.
‚Äî
About SYPartners
SYPartners helps human beings, organizations, and societies build the capability to become fuller and more vibrant versions of themselves‚Äîso they can constantly transform and have a positive impact in the world. For more than 20 years, we‚Äôve worked with executive teams at some of the world‚Äôs most influential companies, including Starbucks, IBM, Facebook, Apple, Nike, Target Corporation, Planned Parenthood, and AARP, and alongside leaders tackling the toughest issues of our time‚Äîeducation, diversity, health care, gender equality. comments: You must answer all the questions quickly in one sitting, because there is no save nor resume, and if Anything interrupts you even for a moment and you try to come back, you'll have to start All Over Again. -_-. This is a programming issue; please solve so everyone can enjoy this app properly. :)
A beautifully designed app and fun exercise. Insightful for all levels. Sparks both introspection and understanding of others' strengths, ultimately making our team more empathetic and effective.
Felt like a pretty accurate assessment. Kind of more interesting to look at the ones that aren't my superpowers.
Really interesting insights into my strengths.
A fun way to figure out how I can contribute best to my team.

title: Logo Maker
description:
The Logo Maker by Laughingbird Software is the easiest way to create images for your business. 

You can create a logo for your site, blog, emails, advertisements, coupons, videos and social media.

You know that a designer will take lots of time and money to make even one logo, not to mention to create
all of the graphics you need for your website, when you need them.

With this app, it's easy and fun to create as many images as you want. Just select a template. Then you have two easy options to make a logo:

1) Add your business name, save and export in just a few minutes or 
2) Spend a little more time adding and modifying the included elements, objects, characters, and photos to make it completely your own. Just drag and drop, pinch or spin each element into the right size and the right place.

No Photoshop or other expensive and difficult program experience required!

recentChanges:
The Logo Maker and Graphics Creator is a brand new app for the Google Play store!
We've been working on it for quite some time and we think you'll love it!

Give the Logo Maker a try and let us know what you think!
comments: Importing my custom images seems to be getting slow to the point... the app crashes into a dark black screen. Other wise than that love it. Worth the money... this app in my opinion needs to be updated.
Really like it thx

Just wish all characters had legs! I love this app, I just wish that I could create close to the tap and open tool drawer button. Whenever you add objects that are close to the tool drawer icon, you lose the ability to select the object or text close to it if you choose to edit it. also, I am using this app on my Samsung Note 2. Since the app opens only in landscape mode it is very difficult to create beyond the bottom of the screen to create vertically.

This app cost far to much to do far too little. The options provided to create a logo are only compatible with web based are exclusively digital use logo creations. If your attempting to make a legitimate business logo you'll find this app to be a complete waste of time and money for the purpose. The best description I can give, is I feel this app would be better suited for children trying to create a fun logo for school projects. In short its not serious. Don't download it!

This app is close but needs a lot.  First it is way too cartoony, so if you are wanting to make a professional looking logo then you are limited.   It also lack a line or circle draw tool.   Fonts are limited too.   The worst part is if you move a block of text to the very bottom it will get stuck and you have to start all over.

title: Business Card Reader Pro - Business Card Scanner
description:
ABBYY Business Card Reader scans and manages all your business cards and contacts in a flash.

‚úì Recommended by The New York Times, CNN, The Telegraph, Computer Business Review, Macworld.
‚úì ‚ÄòIf your desk is strewn with printed business cards this could be the app for you. Throw away your 1980s-style rolodex and download the ABBYY Business Card Reader (BCR)‚Äô - The Telegraph (UK)
‚úì Mobile Star Award Winner of SHINING STAR in the "Contact Manager App" category 
‚úì ABBYY BCR is a Featured App in the Intel¬Æ Business App Portfolio
--------------
With ABBYY Business Card Reader (BCR) you can: 
‚úì Instantly transfer business card data in 25 languages right onto your smartphone 
‚úì Sync cards data across smartphones, tablets and computers via ABBYY‚Äôs cloud and access your contacts from anywhere on ABBYYBCR.COM
‚úì Save contacts in the BCR‚Äôs own storage ‚Äì CardHolder- with convenient search, sorting and grouping functionality 
‚úì Share biz contacts data from BCR via e-mail or SMS and export to Excel 
--------------
KEY FEATURES
‚úì Forget having to manually enter contact details into your smartphone. Unsurpassed data recognition and speed based on famous ABBYY Mobile OCR technology, eliminate having to correct or re-key business cards data, making creating new contacts easy and automatic.
‚úì Sync cards across smartphones, tablets and computers to make business cards database trouble-free, updated and accessible from all your devices on ABBYYBCR.COM.
‚úì Export data from scanned business cards to Salesforce Leads.
‚úì Card Holder, the BCR‚Äôs own storage, provides convenient business card search, as well as sorting and grouping of contacts. You can quickly and easily find biz contact you need.
‚úì ‚ÄòMy cards' group in Card Holder allows to save your own business cards in different languages and for different biz occasions.
‚úì Text notes to cards easy to make, edit, look through and find in BCR‚Äôs storage.
‚úì Quickly verify contacts recognition results. The BCR highlights uncertain characters and displays the original image so that you can confirm or correct the app's output.
‚úì Crop automatically cuts off all the background of the business card‚Äôs photo, making it looking like a real-life business card in the Card Holder.
‚úì Forward recognized contact data from Card Holder via e-mail as VCard and JPEG file or via SMS as a plain text.
‚úì Export to MS Excel to manage business cards database on your desktop.
‚úì Find out more about your new biz contacts on the most popular social networks ‚Äì Linkedln and Facebook right from your BCR!
‚úì Search in Maps for the address of your biz contact with just one tap from ABBYY Business Card Reader
‚úì Backup and restore contacts from saved business cards. 
‚úì Recognize business cards in 25 languages, including multilingual cards (maximum 3 languages simultaneously):

comments: Love the app. Simple and effective way to store business cards. Good export and printouts to Excel or Contact databases. title: Oil Patch Pro Well Finder
description:
If you are out in the Texas, New Mexico, North Dakota, Colorado or Wyoming oilfield, Oil Patch Pro is the well finder app for you!

**Quickly SEARCH through over 900,000 active and permitted oil & gas well locations to find wells you need
**SHARE well location information in-app with your team, field personnel, service providers, and consultants
**NAVIGATE to well locations with audible turn-by-turn directions
**Add locations to your FAVORITES list for quick access, even offline

Our well finder app puts turn-by-turn navigation directions and wellsite information at your fingertips, and allows you to share with your co-workers and friends.

Oil and Gas Operators:
Gain access to our web app (http://app.oilpatchpro.com/) to upload additional location-specific data (i.e. custom location maps and navigation directions, contact information, vendor lists, well notes, and more!) that can then be accessed and shared by privileged users. Well finder app can be used with web app, or stand-alone.

Note:
Well location data is updated as frequently as twice daily. Data includes: Lease Name, Well No., Operator, API No., Lease No., Field, Permit No. & Date, Spud Date, Surface Casing Date, and Completion Date when available. Well finder app.

All the Power and Versatility of the Real Estate Master IIIx calculator ‚Äì on your Android Smartphone.  And while perhaps obvious, if you change from an Android device to an iPhone or iPad, you WILL need to buy a new license as they are incompatible.

‚Ä¢ No learning curve -- just one powerful, easy-to-use calculator app

The Real Estate Master IIIx mortgage payment calculator app from Calculated Industries gives Real Estate professionals the power, portability and ease-of-use of the Real Estate Master IIIx calculator on your Android Smartphone. Calculate complete finance and mortgage payment solutions with mortgage insurance, amortization, FHA, ARMs, rent vs. buy comparisons and more.

title: ŒúŒ§Œë 98-365: Windows Server Administration
description:
Most companies nowadays, even rather small ones, rely, in some way, on a Windows Server installation.

This increased the demand for professionals capable of administering these servers. To cover this demand Microsoft created the exam MTA 98-365 Windows Server Administration Fundamentals. To pass the exam and acquire this rather specialized skillset, you will need all the help you can get.

TEST4U has a solution. It will empower your skills and prepare you for the MTA Exam 98-365. The exam-focused training that TEST4U provides will allow you to feel confident while sitting the exam.

The TEST4U 98-365 Exam training covers the topics contained in the syllabus, so you can gain the skills measured in the test. This way it provides the student with a more thorough knowledge of the above-mentioned topics and even goes a few steps further. It contains approximately 150 questions, a number significantly higher than what other training software, such as GMetrix or Measure Up provide. 


What does TEST4U offer?

By successfully completing our MTA 98-365 TEST4U Module, you will know the fundamentals of Windows Server Administration.

If you have questions about participation fees (price per unit), please contact one of the certified examination centers of the Certification Body, such as Certiport or Pearson Vue.

title: SA Group Text
description:
SA Group Text is the most efficient way to send group messages. You can add recipient names and phone numbers in an Excel file. You can enter static or personalized text messages right in the Excel spreadsheet. For example, if you enter ‚ÄúHi {first name}, ...‚Äù in a message, the app will take the first name of the recipients and personalize the message, generating text such as ‚ÄúHi David, ‚Ä¶‚Äù , ‚ÄúHi Michael, ‚Ä¶‚Äù‚Ä¶

SA Group Text is also an easy way to send text messages to the contacts on your Phone. Just pick groups or individual contacts, type in a static or personalized message and send it.

With SA Group Text you can :
‚òÖ Import group Text from an Excel file via USB/Email.
‚òÖ Create your own groups in an Excel spreadsheet and send messages to them.
‚òÖ Insert tags ({nickname},{firstname},{lastname},{nickname},{company} etc) in your text message in order to create personalized messages. When you use this function, each message has a personal touch. For example:
    Dear {firstname}, Welcome to our dinner party.
‚òÖ Use any Excel-compatible applications to create your group text messages. Be sure to save as an Excel 97-2003 Workbook.
‚òÖ Send SMS to as many recipients as you need within your Excel file 
‚òÖ Create a formatted Excel file easily. The file can contain only two columns : Mobile and Message. You can find more example spreadsheets on the app‚Äôs website.
‚òÖ Create flexible group SMS in your spreadsheet. 
For example ‚Äú{family} Family ‚Äì Practice Tomorrow at 5pm for little {kidname}!‚Äù  becomes ‚ÄúDavid Family ‚Äì Practice Tomorrow at 5pm for little Johnny!‚Äù. The names change over and over again.
‚òÖ Schedule your messages you want to send at a specific time. 
‚òÖ Set the time range of when you want your text message to send.
‚òÖ Support for Dual SIM devices (Android 5.1 or later).
‚òÖ Pause and resume schedules.  You have to long press the schedule to access pause/resume option.
‚òÖ Import and send more 10,000 personalized messages in one time.
‚òÖ Send unsent messages. If the app is terminated while sending group sms, the app can continue the sending schedule after you launch the app.
‚òÖ Make send report and reply report.
‚òÖ The lite version allow you to send 120 messages each time, The full version has no limit.¬†
‚òÖ If you provide the recipient's email address in the excel file , the same message will be sent to their email address. 
In order to send messages via email, you have to
a. Enable send mail in the app‚Äôs setting page.
b. set up an email account to send messages from it.
c. add ‚ÄúSubject‚Äù and ‚ÄúEmailAddress‚Äù in the excel file. you can see the file sample-mail.xls in the app for detail.

Due to Android's SMS limitation, each app can only send 100 messages within an hour. You need to install SA Group text plug-in to extend the SMS limitation.
After download plug-ins, please go to your phone‚Äôs settings, then go to app manager, grant Send SMS permission to these plug-ins.
If the app runs on Android 8.0 and above, please enable the app running in background manually. Please also enable all Group SMS plugins running in background and send sms.
You also have to grant Run in background permission to the app and all plug-ins. Here's the way for some models to grant Run in background permission.

Huawei 
go to Settings -> Battery -> Launch -> SA Group Text app
turn on Auto-launch and Run in background

Samsung
go to Settings -> Apps -> Special access -> Optimise battery usage -> All apps -> turn off SA Group Text

Vivo
go to Settings -> More Settings -> Applications -> All -> SA Group Text -> Permission -> Single Permission Setting -> Autostart

XiaoMi
Permissions -> SA Group Text -> Start in background

title: Who's my mutter
description:
This App was developed to help you discover your Pets breed.  This software will find what the predominant breed in your family Mutt.  

It uses technology to affordably help you find ancestry.  This app will also allow you to connect with local Rescues and Shelters to help you "Find a Friend" for you Pet family member and also easily share your results on Facebook.

You can also create posts of your results and like and comment them.
descriptionHTML:
This App was developed to help you discover your Pets breed. This software will find what the predominant breed in your family Mutt.

It uses technology to affordably help you find ancestry. This app will also allow you to connect with local Rescues and Shelters to help you "Find a Friend" for you Pet family member and also easily share your results on Facebook.

You can also create posts of your results and like and comment them.
summary: We want to revolutionise the way you search for your pets breed.
recentChanges:
- Fixed issue in blogs
- Bug fixes
comments: Great app for dog lovers. The integration of breed detection along with social features is a good combination. Along with that, the ability to search for nearby veterinarian services is a great addition. The app was also fast and stable with no crashes, which is sometimes a rarity on the app store. If you're interested in learning about your dog's pedigree and connecting with other dog owners, this is a good way to go about it.

This app is great! It found the breed for my new puppy Jack and I was amazed to see how accurate it was. The fact that you can find out even more about the breed by going to Wikipedia is really cool too. The best part, I'm new to the area and it helped me find a new vet close by my house. I would highly recommend this app to anyone who has a mixed breed dog!

I love this app! I have done rescue for years and I wish I would have had this a LONG time ago! It's like a DNA test without the price tag. I was able to do my dogs and all of my fosters and the results rock! I love that they promote rescues and shelters too. What great way to help get animals adopted. I highly recommend this app!

I love this! So many fun things to do besides just finding my dog breed. I really loved the larest blog about how to have fun and keep my pup entertained while self quarantined. Best purchase in long time.

I love this app! It is a dog finder, adoption seeker, social sharer, and dog breed discoverer all in one place. While I'm not in the market for a new dog (yet), I love being able to share pictures of my pup with other dog lovers in this online community. And when i do want to adopt another dog, i know just where to look and do my research.

title: Camera To PDF Scanner Pro
description:
PRO version with NO ADS and NO INTERNET PERMISSION
- We ensure 100% that we never collect personal data
- Camera To PDF Scanner is portable document scanner and scan everything as images (JPEG) or PDF file format.
- Camera To PDF Scanner use your smartphone camera to scan multi-page of documents, receipts, notes, whiteboards, card and other text. With this application, you can quickly scan your documents and share  document via Email, bluetooth or Google Drive...
- Camera To PDF Scanner is easier, faster scanning with better interface , greater functionality and less limitations. 


Main features:
- Scan document in color, grayscale, or black & white
- Automatic document edge detection and perspective correction 
- Many kind of sizes (Letter, Legal, A4, A3, Business Card...)
- Many levels of contrast for crisp monochrome texts, multi-page scanning
- Ultra-fast processing, and quick searching
- Easily share docs in PDF or JPEG format via social media, email...

How to use
- Step 1: select the 1st page of document which you want to scan (from Camera or Gallery). then crop the region which you want to scan and next (by click V button in right-bottom corner)
- Step 2: edit the scan result by increase, decrease the levels of contrast, grayscal, color...and save it to a Document (default name New Document).
- Step 3: add more page (2nd page,3rd page..) to Document and convert all page to one PDF file (by click V button in right-bottom corner)
- Step 4: you can directly share this document via mail, bluetooth...(by click Share button) or get PDF file from smartphone memory by using USB cable. PDF files saved in: SDCard/PDFScanner/NewDocument.pdf and all JPEG files saved in SDCard/PdfScanner/Documents.

We would love to hear from our users. If you have any feedback, suggestion that will help us become the best scanning app. Please email for us at: kaikaisoft@gmail.com

title: Aptora Mobile II

title: Qualifier Plus IIIx
description:
Two in one: the official Qualifier Plus IIIx from Calculated Industries for your Android device includes two models: #3415 and #3430 (Qualifier Plus IIIfx).  And while perhaps obvious, if you change from an Android device to an iPhone or iPad, you WILL need to buy a new license as they are incompatible.

All the Power and Versatility of the Qualifier Plus IIIx/IIIfx calculator ‚Äì on your Android device

‚Ä¢ All the functionality of the Qualifier Plus IIIx mortgage payment calculator and the Qualifier Plus IIIfx mortgage payment calculator 
‚Ä¢ Email loan worksheets to your clients from your Android Smartphone 
‚Ä¢ No learning curve -- just one powerful, easy-to-use mortgage loan calculator app 
‚Ä¢ Full User's Guide built in as well as ability to press and hold a key for specific help

The Qualifier Plus IIIx calculator app gives you the same features and functions as the Qualifier Plus IIIx and IIIfx on your Android Smartphone, providing powerful real estate/finance/mortgage calculations.

Need quick, accurate solutions when talking to a client? Instantly calculate P&I, PITI and total loan payments for conventional, FHA and VA mortgage loans. Includes complete buyer qualifying and more. You can even calculate amortization and loan data and e-mail it directly from the app screen on your phone. 

In addition to both common and advanced real estate finance problems and complete buyer qualifying, it calculates net present and net future values (NPV/NFV) as well as multiple cash flows and internal rate of return (IRR).

Ideal for all real estate finance professionals including real estate agents, mortgage brokers, investors, mortgage lenders, title offices and trainers.

Details:

Built-in Real Estate/Finance/Mortgage Solutions for Qualifying Buyers & More
‚Ä¢ Calculate amortizations with remaining balances 
‚Ä¢ Bi-weekly loans and ARMS 
‚Ä¢ Rent vs. Buy finance comparisons and estimated tax savings 
‚Ä¢ Future Value, property appreciation 
‚Ä¢ Calculate IRR for multiple cash flows 
‚Ä¢ Versatile Buyer Pre-Qualifying For Conventional and FHA/VA Home Loans 
‚Ä¢ Various Payment Solutions; P&I, PITI, Total and FHA Payments 
‚Ä¢ Complete Taxes, Insurance and Mortgage Insurance For True PITI Payments 
‚Ä¢ Cash Flows: IRR, NPV and NFV 
‚Ä¢ Automatic Sales Price & Down Payment Calculations 
‚Ä¢ LTV function for quick purchase and refinance decisions 
‚Ä¢ Complete Amortization, Balloon Payments 
‚Ä¢ Bi-Weekly vs. Monthly Home Loan Comparisons 
‚Ä¢ Simplify Complex ARMs 
‚Ä¢ Find APR to Quickly fill out Truth In Lending Statements 
‚Ä¢ Rent vs. Buy Solutions and Estimated Tax Savings 
‚Ä¢ Built-in Date Math Function; Closing and Expiration Dates 
‚Ä¢ Combo Loans and Interest Only Payments 

Special Functions:
‚Ä¢ Amortization screen lets you see all amortization or loan data at once and e-mail it directly from the app screen on your phone 
‚Ä¢ E-mail loan worksheets to your clients from your Android Smartphone 
‚Ä¢ Built-in help ‚Äì just press and hold the desired key for full, clear definitions, explanations and examples of keystrokes 
‚Ä¢ Triple Zero Key saves time and keystrokes 
‚Ä¢ Entry Editing Backspace ‚Äì with a swipe of a finger

TRADEMARKS:
Qualifier Plus¬Æ is a registered trademark of Calculated Industries, Inc.

comments: This tool is fantastic. I've known the folks behind this app for years and have used their custom niche market calculators before anyone even heard of the internet, let alone a Smartphone. Check out their website and see all of the time saving productivity tools that they sell at very competitive prices.

If you are a Real Estate Agent, you've probably bought the physical calculator. I was a bit skeptical when I downloaded the app. Until I ran it. What a pleasant surprise...the thing just works...no issues. There ain't no way I'll forget to take it with me, because like everyone else, my phone is glued to my body. Qualifier Plus...can't leave home without it! Terrific. Oh, oh! Also get their "ConversionCalc Plus", what a little gem that is.

I am a frequent user of this particular calculator, the Qualifier Plus IIIx #3415. Calculated Industries errantly changed the button layout for the app version. They created the app layout created with a CLEAR button. In doing so, however, they removed the BACK button which is integral to all of our frequent calculations. Any entry that only requires a step Back now requires a Clear, which is extremely undesirable. If I see an update with the proper layout, I'll be happy to update this review.

I like this app! It has tons of features that a user can do; one such scenario would be buying a house, a vehicle, etc.. it has everything that a user would want to find out, such as fees, taxes, amortization schedule(s), and so on. It's such an indispensable tool that everyone should have!!! :)
I use this multiple times a day. Absolutely could not imagine my business without it. Thank you!

title: Royal TSD
description:
Royal TSD provides easy and secure access to your remote systems (RDP, VNC, SSH, etc.) by allowing you to open your Royal TS/X documents created with Royal TS (for Windows) or Royal TSX (for macOS).

Those documents can be opened directly from any installed cloud provider like Google Drive, Dropbox or OneDrive. You can even send the documents via email or copy them to your device via USB and then open them with Royal TSD.

Connecting to the remote machines with RDP, VNC, SSH or Telnet is possible with specialized 3rd party apps.

With Royal Server you don't need to connect to the remote desktop anymore. You can manage Windows Events, Windows Services, Windows Processes, Terminal Services, Hyper-V and VMware virtual machines and can start PowerShell scripts on the remote machine directly from Royal TSD.

E.g. if you find an error in the Event Log, then you could restart a service, kill a process, reset a Terminal Services connection or stop and start a Hyper-V virtual machine. When you use PowerShell scripts, then there is no limit of what you can do.

Some supported connection types can be tweaked and optimized for your mobile device. E.g. Remote desktop connections can be configured to always use a lower color depth or screen resolution to save bandwidth.

recentChanges:
- uses fuzzy search when searching in your documents
- fixes multi factor authentication when working with Royal Server documents
comments: As others people said this should be all in one apps like on PC without the need of 3rd party apps (I hope in the future you will improve that). I'm waiting the possibility to create document etc... in the next release as you said :)

Really wanted it to be an all in one app like it is on Mac and PC (though it properly said in the description otherwise). That said the transition to the preferred apps is not laborious and it works similar to the Mac and PC versions.
Keeps crashing when attempting to open password protected document

You cannot directly set up a connection from this app, you are required to send your Royal settings from your computer to your device. If you manage to get through the convoluted process of emailing yourself a rtsd document and then installing it into this app, congratulations! You will then be greeted by an error when initiating a connection, the error saying: "There is no application installed which can start this connection. This app requires other apps to start it." Then it just returns to the menu. It doesn't even try to facilitate the a download for a plugin that would initiate the connection.  Worthless app!

title: GW Mail
description:
GW Mail is an email client for Novell GroupWise. With this app you get a much better interface than Novell delivers by default through GroupWise WebAccess. This app gives you some of the enterprise features that you would not get with simple POP/IMAP - like access to your Frequent Contacts and GroupWise address book.


Current features:
Read your mail list
Notifications for new mailbox items
Switch folders, move items to folders
Read emails, and delete, read later, properties, etc.
Read attachments using the GroupWise WebAccess viewer
Download and view attachments using apps on your device
Compose emails
Address book searching
Accept or decline appointments, tasks and notes

We highly recommend checking out our free GW Lite app to test whether or not your server works with our apps before purchasing this app.

GW Mail for Android has been tested to work with GroupWise 2014, 2012, 8, 7 and 6.5

We have released our GW Calendar as a separate app.  It gives you good access to your GroupWise Calendar with a calendar specific interface.

Support:
To send a support request email, please do so from the app.  Open the app.  From the main page, tap on the Support button in the upper right corner. If you are running an older version of Android, this may be accessed from the menu button.  If you are having trouble doing that, you can send an email directly to support@ghostpattern.com  Please include information about your device and the version of GroupWise that you are using.

title: OWM for Outlook Email OWA
description:
OWM Outlook Web Mobile is an email app that let you use OWA in a smart phone friendly layout, with Auto Login and Email / Meeting Notification.

It is NOT compatible with GMail, Hotmail, Yahoo Mail, AOL, Horde Mail, cPanel or any other mail provider.

Please contact us for customer service, or if you experience any issue.
Try it risk free! Contact us for refund within 24 hours of purchase.

You may contact us at:
WWODevelopment@gmail.com

Feature list:
- Email notification, auto check for new email on a timed interval **
- Calendar appointment and meeting reminder, when enabled, auto set an alarm to alert you before the event **
- Download basic information of calendar events to local calendar, for offline view, to use with third party widget, etc.
- Blink LED indicator for new email and appointment/meeting reminder. (If device is compatible)
- Screen layout reformatted to improve usability on smart phone screen
- Wide screen mode for tablet
- Prefill username, password, auto login
- Schedule "Off Time" to lower power and data usage, or if you don't want to be attached to work email 24/7. When enabled, the app will not check for new email or new/updated Calendar event during the specified time interval, for example, from 6 PM to 7 AM. Applies to Notification only, you can still launch the app to check email manually.
- Desktop browser mode if your company's OWA blocks access from mobile browser.

For regular Office 365 with Exchange, use web address: https://outlook.office365.com/owa
For Office 365 with ADFS login, use web address:
https://www.outlook.com/MyCompany.com, replace MyCompany.com with your company's email address domain.

** For notification to work, Auto Login must be able to bring you directly to Inbox when you launch the app.

*** Upload attachment requires File Explorer, download any one from Google Play if the phone does not come with one.

comments: Was a fine app but now it won't maintain a persistent connection with the server so if your organization requires verification you will have to reverify several times a day and you won't get notifications or calendar updates. Customer support has ignored my request for help and won't even respond to acknowledge the receipt of my email. I'm looking for a replacement app
Was working fine but now I have to manually login Everytime with the same auto login credentials. This negates the calendar sync feature I relied on. Please fix

The App is now unusable... for Samsung s10 phone and S5e Tablet. The app keeps needing to REFRESH to even view anything. Also, can not send an email at all... 'send' goes directly to LOGON screen. Great for years...now..? What happened ?

I was having an issue where I wasn't getting the Outlook 365 popup to be remembered. I cleared everything in Chrome, reinstalled, etc... but it just wouldn't come up. I just got a new phone and, of course, the pop up was there and so I am happy now but I am afraid I will see the issue again. It would be good to know how to reset the browser or settings if needed. Other than that, this app is great if your company requires OWA. Clean interface, good functionality, very few bugs.

Makes my life easier! Use this to coordinate with work colleagues without dragging out the company laptop. Ties right into to our OWA system and gives me all the features from my laptop Outlook App right on my Android phone and Tablet.
